alert.note: Alert for Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Central Ventura County Valleys; Eastern San Fernando Valley; Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Malibu Coast; Northern Ventura County Mountains; Santa Clarita Valley; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Southern Ventura County Mountains; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast; Western San Fernando Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 27 at 9:58PM PDT until October 30 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM SATURDAY TO 10 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...North to northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Isolated gusts to 60 mph in the hills. * WHERE...Portions of southwest California. * WHEN...From 11 PM Saturday to 10 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
